description: A polished, fun dungeon crawler game, good for beginners, with tutorials and plenty of help and in-game info.

This game is great in so many ways. It is easy to get started, and a handful of strategy pointers can keep you alive for a while: lure monsters into corridors, train this skill first, un-ID'd scrolls are safer than un-ID's potions, use the stairs to your advantage, etc. But there is always more to learn, and there is a lively community debating the merits of different approaches on the forums. This is a game to get lost in — and because of it, your first win feels like a huge accomplishment!
summary: Gameplay as deep as the Dungeon

description: controls could use some tuning but I don't know what could be done differently
я не знаю как у них получается с версии 0.11 делать игру одновременно удобнее и интереснее каждый релиз.
summary: это единственная игра в которую я играю

description: This is one of those infinitely re-playable games you could see yourself trying again and again forever. Definitely one of those few games to take to the hypothetical desert island sojourns where you can only play a select number of games.
Been playing this game off and on for over 10 years, still fun. What more can I say?

If this thing is even real, I have a feeling you will be better off installing from a cli, with dnf or flatpak or something like that. It won't launch from the "Software" app using the launch button...nice try, but no dice....in other words "F" for fail.
